snippet.title: Paladins - Be More Than a Hero - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Be more than a hero.  Be a champion.  Play free now: https://www.paladins.com/play-for-free/?lang=en_US&utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=10cTrailer&utm_campaign=GoogleHRX2017
Watch the Paladins $150,000 Invitational at Hi-Rez Expo 2017, live on YouTube and Twitch on January 5-8.

Unlock the Onyx Stallion mount, free and exclusive to our YouTube subscribers: http://www.paladins.com/community/youtube/

Follow us for updates!
http://facebook.com/paladinsgame
http://twitter.com/paladinsgame

Enter a fantasy world of ancient technology in Paladins, a team-based shooter with strategy elements and deep character customization. Through a unique collectible card system, players can amplify and augment a character’s core set of abilities to play exactly how they want to play.  Paladins is a free-to-play, class-based first person shooter from Hi-Rez Studios. Paladins is currently available on PC and Mac. Learn more at www.paladins.com!
